oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in on column, 24 or 25 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
According to the colophon (f. 10r), copy completed on 2 Rajab 960 AH [June 14, 1553 AD].
With: Zubdat al-mukhtaṣarāt fī sharḥ al-Waraqāt (ff. 13r-37v).
MS Arab 260. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
